LanguageData.FogOfPawn.SkillRevealed.Label: {0}'s true {1} skill revealed
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.SkillRevealed.Text: You've discovered that {0}'s actual skill level in {1} is {2}. Any reported value you saw before was inaccurate.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.UnknownTrait.Tooltip: This trait is currently unknown. Its nature will be revealed through the pawn's actions or over time.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.TraitRevealed.Label: {0} revealed trait: {1}
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.TraitRevealed.Text: Through their actions, you've discovered a hidden trait in {0}: {1}.\n\n{2}
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.TraitHideChance: Chance for a trait to start hidden
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.TraitHideChanceToolti: Percentage of traits that will be concealed when a pawn joins. 0% = all visible, 100% = all hidden.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SleeperStory.Label: Sleeper Revealed!
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SleeperStory.Text: {PAWN} drops the facade. Their true skills and motives are now clear.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SleeperCascade.Label: Sleeper Exposed
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SleeperCascade.Text: Your probing has shattered {PAWN}'s cover story. They reveal everything.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SleeperWounded.Label: Sleeper Bleeds Truth
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SleeperWounded.Text: Grievous wounds force {PAWN} to show their real training.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerCaughtLearning.Tex: {PAWN}'s fumbling attempt to learn a basic skill exposes their fraud.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerCalledOut.Label: Scammer Called Out
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerCalledOut.Text: After a sharp accusation, {PAWN} admits the deception.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerMoodBreak.Label: Scammer Breaks Down
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerMoodBreak.Text: A mental snap tears away {PAWN}'s disguise. The truth is ugly.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerPassive.Label: Scammer Unmasked
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerPassive.Text: Rumours swirl until the truth about {PAWN} surfaces.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerCascade.Label: Scammer Revealed
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.ScammerCascade.Text: One secret leads to another—{PAWN}'s entire résumé falls apart.
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SlightMoodBreak.Label: Mask Shattered
LanguageData.Fog.FullReveal.SlightMoodBreak.Text: {PAWN}'s anxiety boils over, stripping away their mild deceptions in a single outburst.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Suspicion.Text: On this day, colonists began noting subtle inconsistencies in {PAWN_nameDef}'s behavior—an upright stance, unusually sharp reflexes. Informal mealtime chatter has turned toward quiet speculation.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Suspicion.Text.1: {PAWN_nameDef} was heard humming a military march while hauling stone. No one else could place the melody.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Suspicion.Text.2: One colonist recorded that during a card game, {PAWN_nameDef} seemed to track hands without ever looking directly at the cards.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Suspicion.Text.3: It was observed that {PAWN_nameDef} sharpens knives with a technique more fitting of academy training than frontier life.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Anomaly.Text: An unexpected crisis disrupted routine. Witnesses report that {PAWN_nameDef} responded with unnatural speed and tactical clarity, issuing orders that even veteran militia instinctively obeyed.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Anomaly.Text.1: During a solar flare, {PAWN_nameDef} bypassed power relays with unfamiliar efficiency, then dismissed the action as mere coincidence.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Anomaly.Text.2: Following a raid alarm, {PAWN_nameDef} was seen snapping into formation protocols not recognized by local defense staff.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Anomaly.Text.3: After a mis-thrown grenade landed nearby, {PAWN_nameDef} reacted instinctively—intercepting, returning it mid-roll—then cited 'muscle memory' as explanation.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Revealed.Text: With no further reason to maintain the illusion, {PAWN_nameDef} assumed a hardened posture and authoritative tone. Observers noted the shift immediately. Their former identity now reads like a discarded mask.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Revealed.Text.1: After the incident, {PAWN_nameDef} stood motionless before stating, "Directive acknowledged." The room reportedly fell silent.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Revealed.Text.2: Eyewitnesses recall {PAWN_nameDef} calmly reciting long strings of coordinates and oath phrases—none matching any known RimWorld factions.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperReveal_Revealed.Text.3: {PAWN_nameDef} exhaled once, drew their sidearm, and disengaged the safety without comment. All present understood something irreversible had occurred.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.DeceiverJoinerOnly: Restrict Deceivers to colony joiners only
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.DeceiverJoinerOnly_To: When enabled (default), only wanderers, refugees, quests or other pawns that join your colony can be Scammers or Sleepers. Disable to allow raiders and other outsiders to spawn as Deceivers.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperChoice.Label: {PAWN_nameFull} stands revealed
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperChoice.Text: The facade has shattered. {PAWN_nameDef}—once just another survivor—now stands revealed as something far more dangerous… or perhaps, necessary. Their movements are sharper, their voice steadier, their eyes no longer darting with uncertainty. Training buried deep has surfaced, and they make no effort to deny it. Now, with the colony watching, {PAWN_nameDef} waits—ready for judgment, or a mission.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperChoice.Text.1: The facade has shattered. {PAWN_nameDef}—once just another survivor—now stands revealed as something far more dangerous… or perhaps, necessary. Their movements are sharper, their voice steadier, their eyes no longer darting with uncertainty. Training buried deep has surfaced, and they make no effort to deny it. Now, with the colony watching, {PAWN_nameDef} waits—ready for judgment, or a mission.
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperChoice.Text.2: The truth can't be hidden anymore. Every gesture, every decision, now makes sense in hindsight—{PAWN_nameDef} was never just a wanderer. The calm in chaos, the instincts that shouldn't belong to a farmer… they were built for more. They step forward without shame, posture perfect, awaiting your decision with a focus only someone trained could maintain. Do you trust them now that the mask is gone?
LanguageData.Fog_SleeperChoice.Text.3: They've worked beside you, bled for the colony, shared meals and storms. But now, {PAWN_nameDef} stands exposed—an agent of something else, once. Weapon… friend? The tension in the air is thicker than dust before a raid. They say nothing, but their stance is unflinching. The choice is yours: cast them out, or embrace the soldier hidden in plain sight.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.VerboseLogging_Toolti: If enabled, Fog of Pawn will print detailed diagnostic messages to the console. Useful for debugging or reporting bugs.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.XPToRevealTooltip: Experience threshold accumulated on a skill before its real level is shown.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.SocialRevealPctToolti: Percentage chance to reveal after each successful social interaction.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.PassiveRevealDaysTool: Average in-game days between passive reveal checks per pawn.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.WorkTabFallbackMask_T: Uses a safer but less accurate method to hide skills in the Work tab for compatibility.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.BiasBadTraitHiding: Bias trait hiding toward negative traits
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.BiasBadTraitHiding_To: If enabled, certain negative traits (Pyromaniac, Wimp, etc.) are more likely to start hidden.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.ScoreBasedLiarChance: Scale deceiver chance by pawn value
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.ScoreBasedLiarChance_: When enabled, more capable pawns have a higher probability of spawning as liars (Scammers or Sleepers).
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.PositiveMoodRevealPct: Percentage chance per hourly check to reveal a hidden trait or skill when the pawn's mood is above 70%.
LanguageData.FogOfPawn.Settings.PositiveMoodThreshold: Mood percentage above which the high-mood reveal roll is evaluated.
